ModMetaData.name: ESCP - Maormer
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
Adds in the Maormer using Humanoid Alien Race Framework. Originally from Aldmeris, the Maormer launched a rebellion, and were summarily banished to Pyandonea. Since their banishment they have taken on some rather different characteristics, and some are even born as leviathans.

-Supports Vanilla Achievements Expanded
-Requires Harmony
-Requires Humanoid Alien Races 2.0
-Based on the 'Elder Scrolls' series by Bethesda Game Studios.
